solution_line_template: The amount of material that Jennie needs per quilts is {total_material_initial} yards / {num_quilts_initial} quilts = <<{total_material_initial}/{num_quilts_initial}={material_per_quilt}>>{material_per_quilt} yards per quilt.

In order to make {num_quilts_target} quilts, Jennie will need {num_quilts_target} quilts * {material_per_quilt} yards = <<{num_quilts_target}*{material_per_quilt}={total_material_required}>>{total_material_required} yards.
